1. Arrange the following numbers in ascending order of A. 3/2 B. 2/3 C. 2 
 magnitude 6/7,13/15,0.865 D. 3 E. 18

2. A sum of money was invested at 8% per annum simple 
interest. If after 4years the money amounts to #330.00, 
find the amount originally invested. 
 
8. Without using tables, evaluate Log 24 + Log42 – Log255 
A. ½ B. 1/5 C. 0 
D. 5   E. 2 
9. John gives one third of his money to Janet who has 
#105.00. He then finds that his money is reduced to 
one-fourth of what Janet now has. Find how much 
money John had at first.
